affine_file.title: Affine file
affine_file.description: Name of file containing affine transform.

config_file.title: Config file
config_file.description: 't1_2_mni152_2mm' or 'fa_2_fmrib58_1mm' or file or string. Name of config file specifying command line arguments.

field_file.title: Field file
field_file.description: file. Name of output file with field.

fieldcoeff_file.title: Fieldcoeff file
fieldcoeff_file.description: string representing a file. Name of output file with field coefficients.

jacobian_file.title: Jacobian file
jacobian_file.description: A file. Name of file for writing out the jacobian of the field (for diagnostic or vbm purposes).

modulatedref_file.title: Modulatedref file
modulatedref_file.description: string representing a file. Name of file for writing out intensity modulated --ref (for diagnostic purposes).

refmask_file.title: Refmask file
refmask_file.description: Name of file with mask in reference space.

warped_file.title: Warped file
warped_file.description: Name of output-file containing the --in image after it has been warped to the --ref image
